form.label: HX - Analysis
form.description: Analysis Dashboard for FireEye HX Events

table.title: Actions Log: IOC Hit provides event acknowledgement and Acquisition Complete provides .mans file download

search.query: eventtype=fe product="HX" * category="*" | lookup acknotes id as id | eval Ack=if(isnull(Ack), "N", Ack) | search Ack=* | table Ack, alert._id, category, alert.host.domain, alert.host.hostname, alert.host.ip, alert.sysinfo.mac_address, alert.host.agent_id, alert.host.agent_version,alert.event_at| rename alert._id AS ID, category as Action, alert.host.domain AS Domain, alert.host.hostname AS Hostname, alert.host.ip AS "IP Address", alert.sysinfo.mac_address AS "MAC Address", alert.host.agent_id as "Agent ID", alert.host.agent_version AS "Agent Version", alert.event_at AS Occurred

eventtype=fe product="HX" alert._id=$ID$ $wild$ | lookup acknotes id as id | eval Notes=if(isnull(Notes), "Empty", Notes) | table Notes, _raw, ext_ref | rename Notes as "Event Notes", _raw AS "Raw Event", ext_ref AS "Event Link"

eventtype=fe product="HX" alert.source="IOC" $wild$ | lookup acknotes id as id | eval Ack=if(isnull(Ack), "N", Ack) | search Ack=* | table Ack, alert._id, category, alert.host.domain, alert.host.hostname, alert.host.ip, alert.sysinfo.mac_address, alert.host.agent_id, alert.host.agent_version,alert.event_at| rename alert._id AS ID, category as Action, alert.host.domain AS Domain, alert.host.hostname AS Hostname, alert.host.ip AS "IP Address", alert.sysinfo.mac_address AS "MAC Address", alert.host.agent_id as "Agent ID", alert.host.agent_version AS "Agent Version", alert.event_at AS Occurred
